title: Egypt begins reassembling ancient pharaoh's boat at new museum
description: CAIRO, Dec. 23 (Xinhua) -- Egypt on Tuesday began reassembling ancient King Khufu's second solar boat at the newly opened Grand Egyptian Museum (GEM), a restoration process expected to take about four years and open for visitors to watch live. Read full story

title: Archaeologists find 2,000-year-old labyrinth that reveals India’s role in ancient global trade
Ancient Egyptian pharaoh's boat is being reassembled in public at the Grand Egyptian Museum
description: A boat belonging to an Egyptian pharaoh is being assembled in full view at the Grand Egyptian Museum's exhibition hall.Staff began piecing together the cedarwood boat, one of two that were found that belong to King Khufu, Tuesday morning as dozens of visitors watched.The assembly of the 42-m...
